## Welcome

This site hosts the practical teaching materials for [**FB2NEP: Nutritional Epidemiology & Public Health**](https://www.reading.ac.uk/modules/documents?acyear=2024%252f5&modcode=FB2NEP&schoolcode=CFP%20CHEM%7CCFP%20FOODBI%7CCFP%20PHARM).  
The data used here are **synthetic and reproducible** — see the [provenance](metadata/provenance.md).  

> It is important that you familiarise yourself with this repository. It will be used for **teaching** and is part of the **assessment**.
